titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2261) to provide for the regulation of lobbyists and gift reform, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Bryant (TX). Petition No: 104-6.

bill.summary: 10/24/1995--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2261 (lobbyist regulation and gift reform).
